traceability_locations.name: Quang Nam Supermarket
traceability_locations.description: Situated in the heart of Quang Nam, Quang Nam Supermarket is your one-stop destination for a diverse range of high-quality products and exceptional customer service. Established in 2010, our supermarket has become a trusted name for local families and businesses, offering a convenient shopping experience with a wide selection of items to meet every need.

traceability_locations.description: Located in the heart of Quảng Nam, Quảng Nam Logistics Co., Ltd. is a trusted name in the transportation and logistics industry. With over a decade of experience, our company specializes in providing efficient, reliable, and cost-effective transport solutions for businesses and individuals throughout Vietnam.

traceability_locations.name: Quang Nam Agro Aggregator
traceability_locations.description: At Quang Nam Agro Aggregator, we are dedicated to connecting local farmers with markets nationwide and beyond. Based in the fertile lands of Quang Nam, our company specializes in sourcing and trading high-quality agricultural produce and fresh fruits. We aim to support farmers by ensuring fair pricing and providing consistent demand for their products, while delivering premium goods to customers and businesses.
traceability_locations.location_description: 222 Huỳnh Thúc Kháng Street, Ward An Xuân, Tam Kỳ City, Quảng Nam Province

content: Global GAP : Global GAP certified for sustainable and responsible agricultural practices.

attributes.activity:
Ri 6 Durian
One of Vietnam's most popular durian varieties, Ri 6 is known for its creamy, buttery texture and rich, sweet flavor. The bright yellow flesh and small seeds make it a favorite among durian enthusiasts. Ri 6 durians are carefully handpicked to ensure they are perfectly ripe, offering the ultimate indulgence for true durian lovers.

Flavor Profile: Sweet, mildly nutty, and creamy.
Best Uses: Enjoyed fresh or used in desserts like durian cakes and ice cream.
content: Mô tả : One of Vietnam's most popular durian varieties, Ri 6 is known for its creamy, buttery texture and rich, sweet flavor. The bright yellow flesh and small seeds make it a favorite among durian enthusiasts. Ri 6 durians are carefully handpicked to ensure they are perfectly ripe, offering the ultimate indulgence for true durian lovers.
Dòng mặt hàng : Ri 6 Durian Farm 001

traceability_locations.name: Tra My Durian Cooperative
traceability_locations.description:
Our farm practices sustainable farming methods, combining traditional techniques with modern innovations to ensure the highest quality produce while protecting the environment. Each durian tree is carefully nurtured over the years, and only hand-picked durians at peak ripeness make it to your table.
The farm is operated by Green Harvest Co., Ltd., a leading agricultural company based in Quảng Nam, committed to delivering fresh, organic fruits to both domestic and international markets. Established in 2015, Green Harvest Co. aims to promote the unique flavors of Vietnam’s highlands while supporting local farmers and fostering sustainable agricultural development.
traceability_locations.location_description: Nam Trà My town, Quảng Nam Province

attributes.activity: Sold to Quang Nam Agro Aggregator

ingredient_descriptions.title: Ingredients
ingredient_descriptions.description: Durian, often referred to as the King of Fruits, is a unique tropical fruit with a rich and creamy texture, making it a versatile ingredient in various culinary creations. Its distinct flavor profile, a combination of sweet and savory notes with a hint of nuttiness, has made it a prized ingredient in both traditional and modern recipes across Southeast Asia and beyond.

ads_descriptions.title: Nhãn hiệu hiện bán tại Việt Nam
ads_descriptions.description: Là nhãn hiệu đạt chứng nhận tiêu chuẩn Việt nam, nhận được sự tin tưởng và tiêu dùng tại nhiều nước trên thế giới, với nhiều loại sản phẩm khác nhau.
